about:
Hello I am Oprativsatoshi21,

This is my page i am 14 yrs old i have been playing on the sever since the MCZone and when they didnt have a multiplayer lobby it was just signs.
My Favorite Mini Game on the MCZone was Survival Games And Hunger Games. Without Those Minigames i would've never met the people i know today without teaming.
I am a guy/dog. Well theres not much really i can say but i love this server and nebula but yeah feel free to add me on skype or check out my youtube channel..peace
